name: Bar fight (kwikrick)
description:
Bar Fight

Don't go in that bar. No one goes in there but hoodlums and troublemakers. You're going anyway? How long will you last? Don't say we didn't warn you.

Controls:

Arrow keys:  move
Z key:  punch

Credits:

Code: Rick (kwikrick)
Graphics: Natalie (my daughter)
Music: from the pico-8 cart "Piano Player: Maple Leaf Rag", by Eric Billingsley
https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?pid=playerpiano-4#p
